birth_place.zh-cn: 清朝广西省桂林府临桂县
birth_place.en: Lingui County, Guilin Prefecture, Guangxi Province, Qing dynasty

death_place.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国北京市

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事家、政治人物，新桂系首领，曾任中华民国副总统、代总统。
description.en: A military figure and politician of the Republic of China, leader of the New Guangxi clique, who served as Vice President and Acting President of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事家、政治人物，曾任中华民国总统，与李宗仁有复杂的政治合作与斗争关系。
description.en: A military figure and politician of the Republic of China, who served as President of the Republic of China, and had a complex relationship of political cooperation and conflict with Li Zongren.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事家，新桂系核心人物之一，李宗仁的重要盟友。
description.en: A military strategist of the Republic of China, a core figure of the New Guangxi clique, and an important ally of Li Zongren.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国军事家、政治人物，新桂系核心人物之一，与李宗仁合作统一广西。
description.en: A military figure and politician of the Republic of China, a core figure of the New Guangxi clique, who cooperated with Li Zongren to unify Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国政治人物，曾在1948年副总统选举中与李宗仁竞争。
description.en: A politician of the Republic of China who competed with Li Zongren in the 1948 vice presidential election.

description.zh-cn: 中国共产党和中华人民共和国的主要创立者和领导人，曾批准并欢迎李宗仁返回中国大陆。
description.en: The main founder and leader of the Communist Party of China and the People's Republic of China, who approved and welcomed Li Zongren's return to mainland China.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国首任国务院总理，促成李宗仁回国并在“文革”期间予以保护。
description.en: The first Premier of the People's Republic of China, who facilitated Li Zongren's return to China and protected him during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁的夫人。
description.en: Wife of Li Zongren.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁的原配夫人。
description.en: First wife of Li Zongren.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁的第三任夫人。
description.en: Third wife of Li Zongren.

description.zh-cn: 历史学家，根据李宗仁口述执笔撰写了《李宗仁回忆录》。
description.en: Historian who wrote "The Memoirs of Li Tsung-jen" based on Li's oral accounts.

en: National Assembly of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的第一届（行宪）国民大会，曾选举李宗仁为副总统，后又通过决议将其罢免。
description.en: The first National Assembly of the Republic of China under the constitution, which elected Li Zongren as Vice President and later passed a resolution to recall him.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国的最高监察机关，曾弹劾李宗仁。
description.en: The highest supervisory body of the Republic of China, which once impeached Li Zongren.

description.zh-cn: 中华民国时期的军阀集团，由李宗仁、白崇禧、黄绍竑等人领导，以广西为基地。
description.en: A warlord clique during the Republic of China era, led by Li Zongren, Bai Chongxi, Huang Shaohong and others, based in Guangxi.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争时期国民革命军的一个战区，由李宗仁担任司令长官。
description.en: A war zone of the National Revolutionary Army during the Second Sino-Japanese War, commanded by Li Zongren.

en: Vice President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国家副元首职位。
description.en: The office of the Vice Head of State of the Republic of China.

en: President of the Republic of China

description.zh-cn: 中华民国国家元首职位。
description.en: The office of the Head of State of the Republic of China.

description.zh-cn: 中国国民党与中国共产党之间在中国境内爆发的第二次内战，最终导致李宗仁等国民党领导人失去在中国大陆的统治权。
description.en: The second civil war fought between the Kuomintang and the Communist Party of China, which ultimately led to the loss of control over mainland China by KMT leaders including Li Zongren.

description.zh-cn: 抗日战争期间的一场重要战役，由李宗仁指挥并取得胜利，极大地鼓舞了全国军民的士气。
description.en: A major battle during the Second Sino-Japanese War, commanded and won by Li Zongren, which greatly boosted the morale of the Chinese army and people.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁的口述自传，由历史学家唐德刚执笔记录整理而成。
description.en: The oral autobiography of Li Zongren, recorded and compiled by historian T. K. Tong.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁与白崇禧、黄绍竑合作，统一广西全省，是新桂系的核心领导人物。
description.en: Li Zongren cooperated with Bai Chongxi and Huang Shaohong to unify the entire province of Guangxi; they were the core leaders of the New Guangxi clique.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁与黄绍竑、白崇禧合作，统一广西全省，是新桂系的核心领导人物。
description.en: Li Zongren cooperated with Huang Shaohong and Bai Chongxi to unify the entire province of Guangxi; they were the core leaders of the New Guangxi clique.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁在1929年的蒋桂战争和1930年的中原大战中与蒋介石为敌。在1948年的副总统选举中，他违背蒋的意愿参选并击败了蒋支持的候选人孙科。
description.en: Li Zongren was an enemy of Chiang Kai-shek in the Chiang-Gui War of 1929 and the Central Plains War of 1930. In the 1948 vice presidential election, he ran against Chiang's wishes and defeated the Chiang-backed candidate, Sun Fo.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁在1948年至1949年蒋介石引退前担任其副总统。
description.en: Li Zongren served as Vice President under President Chiang Kai-shek from 1948 until Chiang's retirement in 1949.

description.zh-cn: 蒋介石于1950年3月1日“复行视事”，恢复总统职权，实质上终结了李宗仁的代总统身份，使其权力被架空。
description.en: Chiang Kai-shek 'resumed the exercise of his duties' on March 1, 1950, restoring his presidential powers, which effectively ended Li Zongren's status as acting president and sidelined him.

description.zh-cn: 在1948年中华民国副总统选举中，李宗仁经过四轮投票最终击败了蒋介石支持的孙科，当选为副总统。
description.en: In the 1948 Republic of China vice presidential election, Li Zongren defeated the Chiang Kai-shek-backed Sun Fo after four rounds of voting to become Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 1952年监察院通过对李宗仁的弹劾案，指其“违法失职”。此案最终导致其于1954年被国民大会罢免。
description.en: In 1952, the Control Yuan passed an impeachment case against Li Zongren for 'violation of law and dereliction of duty'. This case ultimately led to his removal by the National Assembly in 1954.

description.zh-cn: 国民大会根据监察院的弹劾案，经投票表决，罢免了李宗仁的副总统职务。
description.en: Based on the impeachment case from the Control Yuan, the National Assembly voted to recall Li Zongren from his position as Vice President.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁在抗日战争期间指挥第五战区部队取得台儿庄会战的胜利，使其名震一时，极大地提升了他的声望。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Li Zongren commanded the troops of the 5th War Area to victory in the Battle of Taierzhuang, which made him famous and greatly enhanced his prestige.

description.zh-cn: 国民党在第二次国共内战中的失败，导致李宗仁作为代总统的政府垮台，并最终迫使他流亡美国。
description.en: The KMT's defeat in the Second Chinese Civil War led to the collapse of the government with Li Zongren as acting president, ultimately forcing him into exile in the United States.

description.zh-cn: 周恩来促成并具体安排了李宗仁于1965年从海外返回中国大陆，并在“文化大革命”期间对他予以保护。
description.en: Zhou Enlai facilitated and specifically arranged for Li Zongren's return from overseas to mainland China in 1965, and provided him with protection during the Cultural Revolution.

description.zh-cn: 毛泽东批准并欢迎李宗仁返回中国大陆，并于1965年和1966年两次与其会面交谈。
description.en: Mao Zedong approved and welcomed Li Zongren's return to mainland China, and met with him for talks twice, in 1965 and 1966.

description.zh-cn: 李秀文是李宗仁的原配夫人。
description.en: Li Xiuwen was the first wife of Li Zongren.

description.zh-cn: 郭德洁是李宗仁的夫人，于1966年因病逝世。
description.en: Guo Dejie was the wife of Li Zongren, and she passed away from illness in 1966.

description.zh-cn: 在郭德洁去世后，李宗仁于1966年与胡友松结婚。
description.en: After the death of Guo Dejie, Li Zongren married Hu Yousong in 1966.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁在美国期间通过口述自己的生平经历，促成了《李宗仁回忆录》的诞生。
description.en: During his time in the United States, Li Zongren's oral recounting of his life experiences led to the creation of "The Memoirs of Li Tsung-jen".

description.zh-cn: 唐德刚作为历史学家，对李宗仁进行口述历史采访，并执笔记录整理成书，出版了《李宗仁回忆录》。
description.en: As a historian, T. K. Tong conducted oral history interviews with Li Zongren, and then wrote, compiled, and published "The Memoirs of Li Tsung-jen".

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁是新桂系军阀集团的首领。
description.en: Li Zongren was the leader of the New Guangxi clique warlord group.

description.zh-cn: 在抗日战争期间，李宗仁担任第五战区司令长官。
description.en: During the Second Sino-Japanese War, Li Zongren served as the Commander-in-Chief of the 5th War Area.

description.zh-cn: 李宗仁当选为行宪后第一任中华民国副总统。
description.en: Li Zongren was elected as the first Vice President of the Republic of China under the Constitution.

description.zh-cn: 在蒋介石引退后，李宗仁以副总统身份代理总统职权。
description.en: After Chiang Kai-shek's retirement, Li Zongren, as Vice President, acted as the President.
